troubleshooting.title: Orphaned Block-Level Comments Appear After Regenerating Output

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: After regenerating output, block-level comments now appear as orphaned (the ID mapping has been changed).

cause.title: Possible Cause
cause.p: When transforming DITA files, the data-ofbid attribute is automatically generated for block elements that do not have an ID attribute in the DITA source files if the webhelp.enable.block.elements.id.generation transformation parameter is set to yes. Thus, if block-level comments are added in the output on block elements with a data-ofbid attribute generated (for elements that do not have an ID in the source) and then the output is regenerated, the mapping between the block-level comment and the element will be lost and the orphaned comment will be displayed in the commenting component (with a warning symbol in their status badge).

steps-informal.p:
To ensure that the same data-ofbid attribute that is generated during transformations for each block element, you must set IDs on each block element inside the DITA source files. More information on how data-ofbid attributes are generated and how to add IDs for block elements from the DITA source files can be found in the following topics:
Generating IDs for Elements in Author Mode
